reference.title: Pencil Types
reference.shortdesc: This topic describes the various types of pencils in use.

section.p: The following is an example of a definition list.

The following pencil types are available.
✐ Graphite Graphite pencils are the most common types of pencil, and are encased in wood.
✏ Carbon Carbon pencils are generally made of a mixture of clay and lamp black.
✎ Colored Colored pencils have wax-like cores of pigment and other fillers.
